Episodes.Title: Success Failure
Episodes.Writer: Alec Berg, Mike Judge, John Altschuler
Episodes.Actors: Thomas Middleditch, T.J. Miller, Josh Brener
Episodes.Plot: The guys struggle to find funding for Pied Piper's video chat app to keep up with their rapidly growing user base. Erlich faces resistance from Big Head's father. Jack steps on Gavin's toes at Hooli. Richard gets sage advice.

Episodes.Title: Terms of Service
Episodes.Writer: Clay Tarver, Mike Judge, John Altschuler
Episodes.Actors: Thomas Middleditch, T.J. Miller, Josh Brener
Episodes.Plot: Richard butts heads with Dinesh; Erlich makes a play to be involved in Jian-Yang's new app; Jared sets ground rules in his friendship with Richard; Gavin's paranoia over Jack's enthusiasm causes him to make a rash decision.

Episodes.Title: Intellectual Property
Episodes.Writer: Carrie Kemper, Mike Judge, John Altschuler
Episodes.Actors: Thomas Middleditch, T.J. Miller, Josh Brener
Episodes.Plot: Dinesh gets back to the ground while Richard continues to explore his new project. Gavin tries to come out of the new problem he has gotten himself into.

Episodes.Title: Teambuilding Exercise
Episodes.Writer: Meghan Crumley, Mike Judge, John Altschuler
Episodes.Actors: Thomas Middleditch, T.J. Miller, Josh Brener
Episodes.Plot: The SeeFood demo is being prepared, and Big Head's professorship is proving beneficial to his students.

Episodes.Title: The Blood Boy
Episodes.Writer: Adam Countee, Mike Judge, John Altschuler
Episodes.Actors: Thomas Middleditch, T.J. Miller, Josh Brener
Episodes.Plot: Cracks in Richard's latest partnership become more apparent when he has to deal with an unexpected interloper; Dinesh scrambles to find a way out of his new relationship; Monica learns of surprising developments at Raviga.

Episodes.Title: Customer Service
Episodes.Writer: Graham Wagner, Shawn Boxe, Mike Judge
Episodes.Actors: Thomas Middleditch, T.J. Miller, Josh Brener
Episodes.Plot: The guys struggle for funding to launch the latest iteration of Pied Piper. Erlich seeks to join the new VC firm formed by Laurie and Monica. Dinesh and Gilfoyle clash over the alpha build.

Episodes.Title: The Patent Troll
Episodes.Writer: Andrew Law, Mike Judge, John Altschuler
Episodes.Actors: Thomas Middleditch, T.J. Miller, Josh Brener
Episodes.Plot: Richard takes on a patent troll; Gilfoyle battles a smart fridge; Jared embraces multiple identities; Erlich tries to spend time with a new crowd.

Episodes.Title: The Keenan Vortex
Episodes.Writer: Graham Wagner, Rachele Lynn, Mike Judge
Episodes.Actors: Thomas Middleditch, T.J. Miller, Josh Brener
Episodes.Plot: Richard ponders a deal with the tech world's latest "it" boy; Jack faces setbacks.

Episodes.Title: Hooli-Con
Episodes.Writer: Chris Provenzano, Mike Judge, John Altschuler
Episodes.Actors: Thomas Middleditch, T.J. Miller, Josh Brener
Episodes.Plot: The Pied Piper guys try to pull off a stealth plan at Hooli-Con.

Episodes.Title: Server Error
Episodes.Writer: Dan O'Keefe, Mike Judge, John Altschuler
Episodes.Actors: Thomas Middleditch, T.J. Miller, Josh Brener
Episodes.Plot: Richard finds himself in a web of lies; Jared plans his exit; Jack bets big; Gavin plots a comeback.
